This starter supports  MDX . MDX is a format that lets you
seamlessly use JSX in your Markdown documents. You can import components, like
interactive charts or notifs, and export metadata. Find the above React component in  /src/components/Counter…

This is an example of how you can build your site around Markdown files. Images referenced in Markdown are copied to the generated site, like these kittens: Finally, here's some sample code with beautiful syntax highlighting thanks to PrismJS: Go…
